application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details for the sound insulation of the building envelope in pursuant to condition 7 of planning application Ref: 234650FUL dated 29.02.2024 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with  policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) and Ealing SPG10.
description: Details of sound insulation pursuant to conditions 7 of planning permission reference 234650FUL dated 29.02.2024 'Conversion of single dwellinghouse to three self-contained flats; single storey side and rear extension'
